channel.title: Amusement Park Travel
channel.description: The world's most comprehensive amusement park travel planning resource. Expert guides, interactive tools, and insider tips for theme parks worldwide.

item.title: Alton Towers Guide 2025: Britain's Greatest Theme Park
item.description: Complete guide to Alton Towers featuring Wicker Man, The Smiler, Nemesis Reborn, and tips for visiting the UK's most thrilling theme park destination.

item.title: Beto Carrero World Guide 2025: Latin America's Largest Theme Park
item.description: Complete guide to Beto Carrero World in Brazil featuring Hot Wheels, Madagascar attractions, Big Tower, FireWhip, and tips for visiting South America's premier theme park destination.

item.title: Blackpool Pleasure Beach Guide 2025: Britain's Historic Coaster Capital
item.description: Complete guide to Blackpool Pleasure Beach featuring Icon, The Big One, Grand National, and tips for the UK's most historic amusement park.

item.title: Busch Gardens Tampa Guide 2025: Florida's Thrill Capital
item.description: Complete guide to Busch Gardens Tampa featuring Iron Gwazi, SheiKra, Cheetah Hunt, world-class zoo, and tips for Florida's best coaster park.

item.title: Cedar Point Guide 2025: Roller Coaster Capital of the World
item.description: Complete guide to Cedar Point in Sandusky, Ohio featuring Steel Vengeance, Millennium Force, Top Thrill 2, and tips for conquering the world's best coaster collection.

item.title: Chimelong Ocean Kingdom Guide 2025: World's Largest Oceanarium
item.description: Complete guide to Chimelong Ocean Kingdom in Zhuhai featuring the world's largest aquarium, whale sharks, roller coasters, and tips for China's premier marine park.

item.title: Disneyland Paris Guide 2025: Europe's Disney Magic
item.description: Complete guide to Disneyland Paris featuring Avengers Campus, Big Thunder Mountain, Phantom Manor, and tips for visiting Europe's most visited theme park.

item.title: Dollywood Guide 2025: Smoky Mountain Magic & World-Class Coasters
item.description: Complete guide to Dollywood in Tennessee featuring Lightning Rod, Wild Eagle, Dolly Parton's legacy, and tips for the Smoky Mountains' premier theme park.

item.title: Efteling Guide 2025: Europe's Enchanting Fairytale Kingdom
item.description: Complete guide to Efteling in the Netherlands featuring Baron 1898, Symbolica, Fairytale Forest, and tips for visiting Europe's most magical theme park.

item.title: Energylandia Guide 2025: Poland's Coaster Explosion
item.description: Complete guide to Energylandia in Poland featuring Zadra, Hyperion, Abyssus, and tips for Europe's fastest-growing roller coaster destination.

item.title: Europa-Park Guide 2025: Germany's Largest Theme Park
item.description: Complete guide to Europa-Park in Rust, Germany featuring Silver Star, Blue Fire, Rulantica water park, themed hotels, and tips for Europe's most visited theme park.

item.title: Everland Guide 2025: Korea's Largest Theme Park
item.description: Complete guide to Everland in South Korea featuring T Express wooden coaster, Safari World, and tips for visiting Korea's premier theme park destination.

item.title: Ferrari World Abu Dhabi Guide 2025: World's Fastest Roller Coaster
item.description: Complete guide to Ferrari World Abu Dhabi featuring Formula Rossa (world's fastest coaster), Turbo Track, Family Zone, and tips for visiting the world's largest indoor theme park.

item.title: Fuji-Q Highland Guide 2025: Japan's Record-Breaking Extreme Park
item.description: Complete guide to Fuji-Q Highland featuring Eejanaika, Do-Dodonpa, Takabisha, Mount Fuji views, and tips for Japan's most intense theme park.

item.title: Hersheypark Guide 2025: The Sweetest Place on Earth
item.description: Complete guide to Hersheypark in Pennsylvania featuring Candymonium, Fahrenheit, 15 coasters, Chocolate World, and tips for the sweetest theme park experience.

item.title: Holiday World Guide 2025: America's Friendliest Park
item.description: Complete guide to Holiday World in Santa Claus, Indiana featuring The Voyage, Thunderbird, free drinks and parking, and tips for this beloved family park.

item.title: Kings Island Guide 2025: Ohio's Premier Theme Park
item.description: Complete guide to Kings Island in Cincinnati featuring Orion, Mystic Timbers, Beast, and tips for visiting one of America's best regional theme parks.

item.title: Knott's Berry Farm Guide 2025: America's First Theme Park
item.description: Complete guide to Knott's Berry Farm in California featuring GhostRider, HangTime, Knott's Scary Farm, and tips for visiting America's original theme park.

item.title: Liseberg Guide 2025: Sweden's Beloved City Park
item.description: Complete guide to Liseberg in Gothenburg featuring Helix, Valkyria, AtmosFear, and tips for Scandinavia's most visited theme park.

item.title: Lotte World Guide 2025: Seoul's Indoor Theme Park Marvel
item.description: Complete guide to Lotte World in Seoul featuring the world's largest indoor theme park, Gyro Drop, French Revolution, Magic Island, and tips for visiting Korea's favorite park.
